bug.author: mandroid6
bug.description:
Please make sure that this is a documentation issue. As per our GitHub Policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests and build/installation issues on GitHub. tag:doc_template System information
TensorFlow version: 2.0 Doc Link: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/zeros_like
Describe the documentation issue
Raises listed and defined No raises listed
We welcome contributions by users. Will you be able to update submit a PR (use the doc style guide) to fix the doc Issue?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mandroid6>@mandroid6</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jvishnuvardhan>@jvishnuvardhan</denchmark-link> I want to work on this Issue. can you please help me get started with updating docs. Thanks

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ParthS007>@ParthS007</denchmark-link> yes sure. Just find the relevant py file and update the doc string in the function. Also can you take up other similar issues which require docstring update, it would be helpful to have a single PR for them!

I agree with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mandroid6>@mandroid6</denchmark-link> . I would be happy to see a single (mostly two) PR(s) to close these 8 similar issues. Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ParthS007>@ParthS007</denchmark-link> .

okay <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mandroid6>@mandroid6</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jvishnuvardhan>@jvishnuvardhan</denchmark-link> I am going through the Issues and will ask here if I face any difficulty. Thanks for the responses.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mandroid6>@mandroid6</denchmark-link> Do I have to make PR in this repo: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ParthS007>@ParthS007</denchmark-link> Create a PR in TF/TF repo <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pulls>here</denchmark-link> . Thanks!
okay <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jvishnuvardhan>@jvishnuvardhan</denchmark-link> , Will send a PR soon

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mandroid6>@mandroid6</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jvishnuvardhan>@jvishnuvardhan</denchmark-link> What I have to update exactly? I have found the functions is defined here - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py#L1876>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py#L1876</denchmark-link>
What more should I add in the documentation? Thanks for the help.

Update the docstring of the functions you need to improve the documentation of. <denchmark-link:#>‚Ä¶</denchmark-link>
